reviewText: The Angry Video Game Nerd is awesome. His anger towards ****** games is so honest and funny at the same time.
AVGN has been a favorite on youtube since forever and im glad it was put out on DVD.

Set 3 coming at you again with more gross out comedy that'll make you glad you missed out on playing these cruddy games.  The nerd continues to be in top form with his wit and degenerate humor.  Season 3 is the volume 3 condensed onto one disc yet again, including the special features.
